results.content: Great content - very efficient use of time.

results.content: All of these courses seem to do the same thing, and I'm not sure I understand PDO any better now than before. How about an explanation of the $this-> stuff instead of just saying to do it?
results.content_html: All of these courses seem to do the same thing, and I'm not sure I understand PDO any better now than before. How about an explanation of the $this-> stuff instead of just saying to do it?

results.content: Exactly what I needed, great pace, great explanation!  I went from knowing nothing about PDO (and very little mysql) to now using it as my normal process for working with databases.
results.content_html: Exactly what I needed, great pace, great explanation! I went from knowing nothing about PDO (and very little mysql) to now using it as my normal process for working with databases.

results.content: Good course clear and easy to follow. If like me you have been using PDO for years. This course refreshes you memory. If you are still using mysqli_query or worse mysql_query to connect to your database. Take this course and improve your code as well as security.
results.content_html: Good course clear and easy to follow. If like me you have been using PDO for years. This course refreshes you memory. If you are still using mysqli_query or worse mysql_query to connect to your database. Take this course and improve your code as well as security.

results.content: I really liked this course, it was taught well and despite the fact that I've been using PDO for years I'd never taken the time to read through the documentation and just relied on what I'd learnt from examples in online articles / tutorials as a result I learnt a few useful bits from this course.
results.content_html: I really liked this course, it was taught well and despite the fact that I've been using PDO for years I'd never taken the time to read through the documentation and just relied on what I'd learnt from examples in online articles / tutorials as a result I learnt a few useful bits from this course.

results.content: Learned a lot from the PDO course. Can't wait to start using it.
results.content_html: Learned a lot from the PDO course. Can't wait to start using it.

results.content: Easy to understand and good examples.
The course is fast paced which is great, but some parts could be explained a bit more thoroughly.

results.content: Instructor gives plenty of examples and seems knowledgeable
